name: In Sheep's Clothing (Mango Mob)
description:
Global Game Jam 2022: Duality submission

Wolves have impersonated your livestock and you must determine which sheep are actually wolves by using your trusty dog or sniper rifle. Find them all before your livestock is killed or before you run out of ammo. 

Team:

  •  Fiona Cheung            
  •  Michael Jordan       
  •  Peter Nguyen              
  •  Sabrina Li      
  • William De Beer 
  • William Lawrence

Controls:

  • [W/A/S/D] to move
  • [Left Mouse] to Shoot
  • [Middle Mouse] to Send dog
  • [Space] to Jump
  • [L. Shift] to Sprint

Tips: 

  •  Wolves will not kill any sheep if they are being watched.
  •  Use your dog to reveal any wolves at a location, but beware they will become enraged.
  •  Killing a wolf will reward you with an additional bullet.
